title: Plotting data from TinyTags fi
text: Data recorded Gemini TinyTag loggers can downloaded using TinyTag Explorer software. tinyTag_plot() function seedTools provides simple way clean exported .csv file generate dual-axis plot showing recorded temperature humidity time. use function, supply path .csv file , optionally, custom title plot. example: tinyTag_plot("example_file.csv", title = "TinyTag Plot Example")

title: Authors and Citation
text: Pablo Gomez Barreiro. Author, maintainer. Roberta Dayrell. Author.

title: Go-To Toolbox for Seed Biology
text: seedTools R package offering collection functions designed simplify seed biology-related tasks. aims ever-expanding repository tools—“function bazaar”—users can contribute share functions streamline common workflows media calculations, data analysis, visualization. Whether ’re looking accelerate seed biology tasks provide tools benefit wider community, seedTools help.

title: Go-To Toolbox for Seed Biology
text: install seedTools GitHub, first ensure devtools (remotes) package installed (e.g. install.packages("devtools")). load devtools library(devtools) (remotes library(remotes)) run devtools::install_github("pgomba/seedTools") (equivalently remotes::install_github("pgomba/seedTools")). clone repository, build package, install locally. installation complete, load package usual via library(seedTools) can begin using functions.

title: Go-To Toolbox for Seed Biology
text: seedTools evolves, incorporating contributions multiple authors, maintaining stable citation package whole can become challenging. Publishing package static format may adequately recognize future contributors updates. Instead, recommended approach cite individual functions directly work. example: “used rh_mix() function seedTools package (https://github.com/pgomba/seedTools).” bibliography, reference package : seedTools (2024). Go-toolbox seed Biology. v.0.1. Available https://pgomba.github.io/seedTools/.

title: Go-To Toolbox for Seed Biology
text: submit function, feel free push GitHub repository. Alternatively, can send .R file containing function , possible, relevant roxygen documentation. Whether ’re submitting single function family related functions, please include short article guide users provide starting point. Whenever possible, keep function dependencies (libraries) minimum.

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
text: Obtain T50 values using Coolbear et al. (1984) formula modified Farooq et al.(2005). Vector containing scoring days must length vector containing cumulative germination data

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
code: coolbear(   day = "vector containing scoring dates",   cumulative = "vector containing cumulative germination for each day",   n = "total number of viable seeds" )

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
text: day vector containing scoring days cumulative vector containing cumulative germination day n Number viable seeds Petri dish (Total sown seeds - empty seeds)

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
text: t50 value days

title: Obtain T50 values — coolbear
